timeline.bodyText: Should we move the check to the constructor ?
timeline.author: danny0405

replies.bodyText: I think there is not much difference. It's more easier to check the expectedNum in the getSinkRuntimeProvider, because we have to check runtimeSink and primaryKey.
replies.author: wuchong
